response.overview: The age-old tradition of gift-giving is rich with cultural significance, helping people build relationships and extend generosity for as long as history has been documented. While the gift inside tends to be the star of the show, the labor of love that goes into wrapping cannot be overlooked. Each gift is an opportunity to share a little extra joy with those around you.Jerry Jafano takes it to the next level. Seeing ornately wrapped gifts in a magazine as a teen was the catalyst for Jerryâ€™s passion for the perfect package, one that he has continued to refine and perfect over the years. Straight and crisp edges are precisely measured to fit each box. Bins of bows are dug through to find the exact pop of color that compliments the meticulously placed ribbons. The finished product is a beautiful gift itself, granting the recipient with a beautiful work of art to adorn their holiday display for the season.
response.title: Wrapped
